item.title: CVE-2023-1262|2024-08-02T05:40:59.829Z -- silabs.com -- wi-sun%20linux%20border%20router
item.description: Missing MAC layer security in Silicon Labs Wi-SUN Linux Border Router v1.5.2 and earlier allows malicious node to route malicious messages through network.
